headMarkup:
<meta charset="UTF-8" />
<meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1" />
<title>Welcome to LWC Communities!</title>
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/styles.css?{ versionKey }" />
<!-- webruntime-branding-shared stylesheets -->
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/salesforce-lightning-design-system.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-site-spacing-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-styling-hooks.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<link rel="stylesheet" href="{ basePath }/assets/styles/dxp-slds-extensions.min.css?{ versionKey }" />
<!-- webruntime-branding-shared stylesheets -->
<style>

@font-face {
    font-family: "font_AvantBold";
    src: url('{ basePath }/sfsites/c/resource/HP_EC_AvantBold') format('woff');
 }
  @font-face {
    font-family: "font_AvantRegular";
    src: url('{ basePath }/sfsites/c/resource/HP_EC_AvantRegular') format('woff');
 }

  .green {
    color: var(--green);
  }

  .blue {
    color: var(--blue);
  }

  .violet {
    color: var(--primary-colour);
  }

  .white {
    color: var(--white);
  }

  .rose {
    color: var(--rose);
  }

  .orange {
    color: var(--orange);
  }

  .c-content-bg {
    box-shadow: var(--box-shadow);
    background-image: var(--bg);
    color: var(--text-color);
  }

  .hp-bigTitle {
    font-family: var(--font-bold);
    font-size: 22px;
    line-height: 30px;
    font-weight: bold;
    text-align: left;
    text-transform: uppercase;
    color: var(--text-color);
  }

  .hp-firstButton {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    font-family: var(--font-bold);
    height: 60px;
    margin: 20px 0 10px 0;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    background-color: var(--secondary-colour);
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 17px;
    color: var(--true-black);
    cursor: pointer;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }

  .hp-firstButton:hover {
    background-color: var(--text-color);
    color: var(--secondary-colour);
  }

  .hp-firstButton:active,
  .hp-firstButton:focus {
    background-color: var(--primary-colour);
    color: var(--white);
  }

  .hp-secondButton {
    display: flex;
    justify-content: center;
    align-items: center;
    font-family: var(--font-bold);
    height: 60px;
    margin: 5px 0;
    padding: 10px 15px;
    border: solid 4px var(--secondary-colour);
    background-color: var(--bg-base);
    text-align: center;
    font-size: 17px;
    color: var(--text-color);
    cursor: pointer;
    text-transform: uppercase;
  }

  .hp-secondButton:hover {
    border: solid 4px var(--text-color);
  }

  .hp-secondButton:active,
  .hp-secondButton:focus {
    border: solid 4px var(--primary-colour);
  }
  .hp-secondButton:disabled, 
.hp-firstButton:disabled  {
  color: var(--white);
  background-color: var(--disabled);
  border: 4px solid var(--disabled);
  background-image: none;
  outline: none;
}
.hp-secondButton:disabled:hover,
.hp-firstButton:disabled:hover,
.hp-secondButton:disabled:active,
.hp-firstButton:disabled:active  {
  outline: none;
}

  .hp-btnContainer {
    display: grid;
    justify-content: center;
  }
    
  .hp-link>a{
     color: var(--secondary-colour);
  }
    
  .hp-link>a:hover,
  .hp-link>a:active,
  .hp-link>a:focus {
      color: var(--text-color);
  }

  .hp-link>a{
      font-family: var(--font-bold);
      font-weight: bold;
      font-size: 14px;
    }
   
    .hp-link a {
      position: relative;
      text-decoration: underline;
    }
      
    .hp-link a:before {
      font-style: normal;
      font-weight: normal;
      text-indent: 0em;
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;
      width: 100%;
      height: 100%;
      font-size: 1.4em;
      -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;
      text-decoration: none;
    }
   
    .hp-link .chevron::before {
      border-style: solid;
      font-size: 16px;
      border-width: 0.15em 0.15em 0 0;
      content: '';
      display: inline-block;
      height: 0.60em;
      right: 0.15em;
      position: absolute;
      top: 4px;
      vertical-align: top;
      width: 0.60em;
    }
    
    .slds-modal__container {
      margin: 0 auto;
  	}
    
    .column-content { max-width: 100%; }
    

    .slds-form-element__label.hp-inputLabel {
      font-family: var(--font-bold);
      font-size: 16px;
      font-weight: bold;
      color: var(--true-black);
      text-align: left;
    }
    .slds-form-element__label.hp-inputProfilLabel {
      font-family: var(--font-bold);
      font-size: 14px;
      font-weight: bold;
      color: var(--text-color);
      text-align: left;
    }

    .hp-textInput {
      text-align: left;
      background: transparent;
      border: none;
      border-bottom: 2px solid var(--secondary-colour);
      padding: 0;
    }

    .hp-textInput:focus-visible,
    .hp-textInput:active,
    .hp-textInput:focus {
      border: none;
      border-bottom: 2px solid var(--primary-colour);
    }

    .disabled {
      color: var(--dark-disabled);
    }

    .disabled .slds-form-element__label {
      color: var(--dark-disabled);
    }

    .disabled .hp-textInput {
      background: transparent;
      border-bottom: 2px solid var(--dark-disabled);
      color: var(--dark-disabled);
    }

    .disabled .hp-textInput:focus-visible,
    .disabled .hp-textInput:active,
    .disabled .hp-textInput:focus {
      border: none;
      border-bottom: 2px solid var(--dark-disabled);
    }
    .disabled .hp-textInput::placeholder {
      color: var(--dark-disabled);
    }
    
    .hp_container {
      display: grid;
      justify-content: center;
      margin: 30px;
	}

    
    
@media (max-width: 1280px) {

    /* 1280px screen and all screens smaller */
     .hp_container {
   		 margin: 15px;
  	  }
   
}

@media (max-width: 1024px) {

    /* Ipad and tablets */
   
}

@media (max-width: 576px) {

    /* mobiles */
    
  .hp-bigTitle {
    font-size: 20px;
  }
    
  .hp_container {
    margin: 15px 0;
  }
   
}
    

  :root {
    --dxp-g-root-font-family: 'HP_EC_AvantRegular', Helvetica, sans-serif;
    --dxp-g-heading-font-family: 'HP_EC_AvantBold', Times, serif;
    /* cancel salesforce styles */
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-block-start: 0;
    --dxp-s-section-content-spacing-block-start: 0;
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-inline-end: 0;
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-block-end: 0;
    --dxp-s-section-content-spacing-block-end: 0;
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-inline-start: 0;
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-block-start-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-s-section-content-spacing-block-start-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-inline-end-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-block-end-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-s-section-content-spacing-block-end-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-c-section-content-spacing-inline-start-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-c-component-wrapper-spacer-size: 0;
    --dxp-s-component-wrapper-spacer-size: 0;
    --dxp-c-column-spacer-size: 0;
    --dxp-s-column-spacer-size: 0;
    --dxp-g-spacing-medium: 0;
    --dxp-c-column-spacer-size-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-s-column-spacer-size-mobile: 0;
    --dxp-c-component-wrapper-spacer-size-mobile: 0;
	--dxp-s-component-wrapper-spacer-size-mobile: 0;
      
    --dxp-g-destructive: #c5069d;
    --slds-c-input-color-border: transparent ;
    --slds-c-input-color-background: transparent;
    --input-color-background: transparent;
      
    --sds-c-input-color-background: transparent;
  	--dxp-s-form-element-color-background: transparent;
  	--dxp-g-root: transparent;
      
    --sds-c-input-radius-border: 0;
	--dxp-s-form-element-radius-border: 0;
      
    --sds-c-input-color-border: transparent;
    --dxp-s-form-element-color-border: transparent;
	--dxp-g-neutral-3: transparent;
      
    --sds-c-input-color-border-focus: transparent;
    --dxp-s-form-element-color-border-focus: transparent;
    --dxp-g-brand: transparent;
      
    --slds-c-input-spacing-horizontal-start: 0;
    --sds-c-input-spacing-horizontal-start: 0;

    --slds-c-input-shadow-focus: 0;
    --dxp-g-brand-1: 0
    --sds-c-input-shadow-focus: 0;
  }

  .interactions-component.webruntimedesign-componentWrapper_componentWrapper {
    min-height: 0 !important;
  }
</style>
label: main
